title: Sekai Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Organic, Fast food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One of two cafes. Aims to attract particularly vegetarians, vegans, and Muslims. Most of menu can be customized to be veg. White sugar is vegan. Staff speaks English. Free Wi-Fi. Near Oshiage station and Sky Tree.
